DOC.brief_summary: The Aim study prove non-inferiority Closone Combination treatment Plavix Astrix .
DOC.brief_title: Phase IV Study Compare Efficacy Safety Plavix 75mg With Astrix 100mg Closone
DOC.criteria: Subjects stable condition PostPercutaneous Coronary Artery Intervention three month 20~86 year old Willing adhere protocol requirement sign inform consent form Subject undergo fail DrugStent Implantation Subjects take anticoagulant , antithrombotic regularlly ( â‰¥ 2weeks month ) study , plan continuous treatment study ( Except Aspirin alone combination Aspirin Clopidogrel ) Subjects history substance alchol abuse Subjects history hypersensitivity Clopidogrel , Aspirin NSAIDS Subjects Aspirin NSAIDsinduced Asthma history Subjects Severe hepatopathy ( AST ALT > 5 time upper limit normal ) Subjects Severe nephropathy ( Cr > 3 time upper limit normal ) Subjects hemorrhage like gastric ulcer , intracranial hemorrhage etc . Subjects high risk hemorrhage like blood coagulation disorder , uncontrolled severe hypertension , active bleeding , history severe bleed subject pregnant , breastfeed Subjects use medically acceptable birth control Subjects unsuitable take Investigational product due medical/mental condition Subjects inherently Galactose malobsorption , Lactase deficiency GlucoseGalactose malobsorption
